EXCEPTION_MSG

See Also:
Constant Field Values

code

public int code
A code that can be used to indicate the type of exception

msgKey

public java.lang.String msgKey
A key for a message that can be used to Internationalize the exception message. The key is defined in the AdminMessages*.properties message catalog (or in the database if the store is configured to store messages in the database).

hideMoreDetails

public boolean hideMoreDetails
Can be used to hide the "More Details" button on the Exception warning dialogue inside the Admin App. This can be useful if you are doing some custom validation in a custom engine and throwing an exception to indicate an error but you don't want the user to see any more detail than the main exception message.
